name: Notepad - notes & list
description: Notepad is the simplest notepad app for android free. You can write notes, make shopping list & to-do list in a quick way. You can also use it to write diary and protect them with password.  Feature: - Save note in local, never upload to cloud. Its safe. - Notepad with password. - Support Fingerprint protection for free. - Markdown supported. - Light theme or dark theme to choose from. - Manage notes with tags. - Notepad app for android free.  You can use Notepad to: - take note. - make shopping list. - make to-to list. - make checklist. - write diary. - write memo.  Taking notes with Notepad is easier than any other notepad apps.
